song_name: Super Smash Bros Melee - Yoshi's Story
metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Super Smash Bros Melee - Yoshi's Story is more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension and Chord Progression Novelty.
key_conclusion: Super Smash Bros Melee - Yoshi's Story has sections analyzed in the following keys: G Mixolydian, G Major,  and C Major.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
